title: World leaders hail Biden’s ‘brave’ decision to end his 2024 campaign
content: Biden, who served on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee before ascending to higher office, nurtured relationships with many world leaders over decades.
summary: Biden, who served on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee before ascending to higher office, nurtured relationships with many world leaders over decades.

title: See how Social Security retirement benefits stack up globally
content: A look at how the U.S. public pension system stacks up to more than 100 others, in five charts.
summary: A look at how the U.S. public pension system stacks up to more than 100 others, in five charts.

title: Netanyahu comes to Washington as Biden withdraws from presidential race
content: The shifting political winds in Washington could empower Netanyahu, analysts said, at a crucial time in Gaza cease-fire and hostage-release negotiations.
summary: The shifting political winds in Washington could empower Netanyahu, analysts said, at a crucial time in Gaza cease-fire and hostage-release negotiations.

title: Israel intercepts missile from Yemen after airstrikes on Houthi port
content: Israeli forces said the missile was launched from Yemen a day after Israel struck a Houthi-controlled port there and two days after a rare Houthi attack in Tel Aviv.
summary: Israeli forces said the missile was launched from Yemen a day after Israel struck a Houthi-controlled port there and two days after a rare Houthi attack in Tel Aviv.

title: ‘Magical’ self-portrait was hidden for decades — until the canvas was flipped
content: The self-portrait by Norman Cornish, a celebrated 20th-century British artist, was found when a conservator removed a board at the back of another artwork.
summary: The self-portrait by Norman Cornish, a celebrated 20th-century British artist, was found when a conservator removed a board at the back of another artwork.

title: Venezuela’s presidential election: How to run against an autocrat
content: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, trailing challenger Edmundo González in polls, has stepped up repression ahead of what he pledged would be a free and fair election.
summary: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, trailing challenger Edmundo González in polls, has stepped up repression ahead of what he pledged would be a free and fair election.

title: Israel strikes Yemen port after Houthis claim drone attack in Tel Aviv
content: Israel’s attack Saturday heralded a further expansion of the war in Gaza, and added a volatile new dynamic to what has become a building regional conflict.
summary: Israel’s attack Saturday heralded a further expansion of the war in Gaza, and added a volatile new dynamic to what has become a building regional conflict.

title: Toll in Bangladesh protests tops 100 as Dhaka falls quiet under curfew
content: Dhaka and several other Bangladeshi cities have been engulfed by protests in opposition to a new policy reserving a portion of government jobs for certain groups.
summary: Dhaka and several other Bangladeshi cities have been engulfed by protests in opposition to a new policy reserving a portion of government jobs for certain groups.

title: In this city, people say Russia must defeat Ukraine and the West at any cost
content: The Post visited Kirov, in western Russia, where residents say President Vladimir Putin’s war in Ukraine is a fight for Russia’s survival against the U.S. and NATO.
summary: The Post visited Kirov, in western Russia, where residents say President Vladimir Putin’s war in Ukraine is a fight for Russia’s survival against the U.S. and NATO.

title: Yemen’s Houthis claim drone strike near U.S. Embassy branch in Tel Aviv
content: One person was killed and at least five injured in the attack, which Israeli officials say probably came from Yemen.
summary: One person was killed and at least five injured in the attack, which Israeli officials say probably came from Yemen.

title: What caused the Windows outages affecting flights, companies around the world
content: Microsoft said it was aware of an issue affecting Windows programs running cybersecurity technology from CrowdStrike. Here’s how flights, hospitals and services were affected.
summary: Microsoft said it was aware of an issue affecting Windows programs running cybersecurity technology from CrowdStrike. Here’s how flights, hospitals and services were affected.
